price: 82 Ils taillaient dans le roc des demeures où ils se croyaient en sécurité.
arabic: وَكَانُواْ يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wakānū yanḥitūna mina al-jibāli buyūtan āminīna
